mapper.select: SELECT a.article_id, a.title, a.type_id, a.keyword, a.summary, a.context, a.read_number, a.create_time, t.type_id "type.type_id", t.type_name "type.type_name", t.number "type.number" FROM article a INNER JOIN type t ON a.type_id = t.type_id WHERE a.article_id = #{articleId}

SELECT a.article_id, a.title, a.type_id, a.keyword, a.summary, a.context, a.read_number, a.create_time, t.type_id "type.type_id", t.type_name "type.type_name", t.number "type.number" FROM article a INNER JOIN type t ON a.type_id = t.type_id ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT a.article_id, a.title, a.type_id, a.keyword, a.summary, a.context, a.read_number, a.create_time, t.type_id "type.type_id", t.type_name "type.type_name", t.number "type.number" FROM article a INNER JOIN type t ON a.type_id = t.type_id ORDER BY a.read_number DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}

SELECT a.article_id, a.title, a.type_id, a.keyword, a.summary, a.context, a.read_number, a.create_time, t.type_id "type.type_id", t.type_name "type.type_name", t.number "type.number" FROM article a INNER JOIN type t ON a.type_id = t.type_id WHERE t.type_id = #{typeId} OR DATE_FORMAT(a.create_time, '%Y年%m月') = #{createTime} ORDER BY a.create_time DESC LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
SELECT DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y年%m月') "create_time", count(*) "count" FROM article GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(create_time, '%Y年%m月') ORDER BY create_time DESC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO article (title, type_id, keyword, summary, context, read_number, create_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{typeId}, #{keyword}, #{summary}, #{context}, 0, now())
mapper.update: UPDATE article SET title = #{title}, type_id = #{typeId}, keyword = #{keyword}, summary = #{summary}, context = #{context} WHERE article_id = #{articleId}
